zebra4j

Class AllDifferentType

  • java.lang.Object
    • zebra4j.AllDifferentType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttributeType
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicAttributeType

    public abstract class AllDifferentType
extends java.lang.Object
implements AttributeType
    A type of attribute that is guaranteed to be different for all people

      • describeSet

        public java.lang.String describeSet(java.util.Collection<Attribute> set,
                                    java.util.Locale locale)
        Description copied from interface: AttributeType
        Describe the given set of attributes in the form of sentence, in the given locale, describing a rule for solving a puzzle.

        The sentence is in the form: People's names are Mary, Jane and Steve.

        Specified by:
        describeSet in interface AttributeType
        Parameters:
        set - the set of attributes of this type, used in a puzzle
        Returns:
        a sentence string, not null.

      • toSolutionSet

        protected static java.util.List<Attribute> toSolutionSet(Attribute[] allValues,
                                                         int numPeople)
        Returns a list of the first "numPeople" elements of the given array

        Used to implement AttributeType.getAttributes(int) in AllDifferentType implementations with an fixed set of attributes.

        Parameters:
        allValues -
        numPeople -
        Returns:
        a list of attributes as in AttributeType.getAttributes(int)
